Text: Apart from showing that, like you, most people don't use the Search Torrents tool and download on the fly, what's the use of posting a duplicate? Duplicating low-volume torrents is giving them the kiss of death.

You were not able to locate my 3-day-old torrent before attempting an upload of your mammooth duplicate and now, after being told, you duplicate my torrent with my own file, branded with my own username to boot!

I made you do it. Please, forgive me.
Eat a big dick you cry baby.
